name: Impoundments
functionStatement: Runoff and infiltration sustain natural flow regime, carry appropriate sediment and nutrients from uplands, and reliably cue spawning/migration of aquatic life.
descriptionMarkdown: Flow is near-natural, with no major dams or only negligible small ones, unless larger dams are historically normal.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Desktop dam inventory and NHD flow regs

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Large reservoir close upstream with hydropeaking or strict seasonal rule curves.
Criteria: Heavily regulated system

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Several moderate impoundments in series.
Criteria: Multiple moderate dams affecting peaks/baseflow

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: One small off-channel dam upstream. Limited storage.
Criteria: 1-2 small dams, partial influence

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: No major dams. Only small farm ponds far upstream.
Criteria: None or negligible influence
